ResearchProjectDef.label: stainless steel alloying
ResearchProjectDef.description: Alloy a special type of steel immune to corrosion, a necessary material in the fabrication of prosthetic parts, bionics and synthetic organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: steel alloying
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smelt Iron along with carbon obtained from wood using high temperatures, allowing you to alloy steel, a much harder and efficient material.
